entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as the one who called out to Harry and took out her wand, indicating she is a key character in this scene. ("Stand back! Hermione called to him...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who is being spoken to by Hermione and is helping Buckbeak, indicating he is a key character in this scene. ("Stand back! Hermione called to him...", "Get on — there’s not much time")

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is described as a hippogriﬀ that Harry and Hermione are trying to escape on, indicating it is an important entity in this scene. ("Get on — there’s not much time", "Okay, Buckbeak, up!")

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is described as a person who is being helped by Harry and Hermione to escape, indicating he is an important entity in this scene. ("How — how — ? said Black weakly")

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is described as a person who has gone to get the dementors, indicating he is an important entity in this scene. ("the dementors are coming — Macnair’s gone to get them")

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as the entities that Black and Harry are trying to escape from, indicating they are an important entity in this scene. ("the dementors are coming")

entities.name: west tower
entities.description: The West Tower is described as a location that Buckbeak and the others fly over, indicating it is an important entity in this scene. ("high as the top of the West Tower")

relationships.description: Harry is helping Buckbeak by gripping him firmly on either side of his neck to hold him steady. ("Get on — there’s not much time", "gripping Buckbeak ﬁrmly on either side of his sleek neck")
Harry is helping Hermione by shaking the rope to help Buckbeak take off. ("Okay, Buckbeak, up!")
Black is riding on Buckbeak behind Hermione. ("In seconds, he had managed to ﬂing one leg over Buckbeak’s back and pull himself onto the hippogriﬀ")
Buckbeak lands on the battlements of the West Tower. ("Buckbeak landed with a clatter on the battlements")
